name: 女神驾到
summary:
"Happy together" is a live action real-actress-recorded dating game. In the game, players will develop romantic stories with multiple female characters. You get to decide with whom to enter into a relationship in the end. It is a must-have training program for dating and picking up girls in real life. 
 
Game features: 
 
1. Gorgeous babes - more than a dozen leading female characters acted by popular online celebrities. 
2. Interactive Live Videos - regular online live video interaction with the actresses in real life. 
3. Self-directed plot lines - decide your own endings based on your personal preference. 
4. Dress up the “girlfriends” - dress up your girlfriends with the outfits of your choice, and develop your relationships to your liking. 
5. Regular updates - monthly updates with new female characters and with new outfits. 
 
Caring supportive service: 
 
Meow Flirts official wechat player communication group: 461983761
